title: Filtering Data
text: The correct feature will help you filter your data based on a certain condition.

title: Setting Up Filters
text: To highlight negative values in the 'Sales Amount' column, which menu should you access in the spreadsheet software?

hintAnswer: Set a rule to highlight cells with values less than $$0$$.
title: Creating Rules
text: After accessing the Format menu, what rule should you set to highlight cells with negative values?
choices: Highlight cells with values greater than $$0$$.
Highlight cells with values equal to $$0$$.
Set a rule to highlight cells with values less than $$0$$.
Set a rule to highlight cells with values equal to $$100$$.
